text:
@RandPaul @NYGovCuomo You know, Rand, you were one of the lucky ones who survived.  In case you haven't heard, that doesn't mean you won't get it again. It's a coronavirus,  like the common cold. You don't have permanent immunity. 

Just shut up. 🙄
